Articles.Content:
sorry for bumping this post but i have a few questions i need to ask

is there any way to keep all of the parts with out messing up the original vanilla parts thanks Bryan Ashenden AKA meteorite 101

Change the \'name\' parameter in the .cfg\'s of the conflicting parts to something else.
but i want to keep the stock parts with out messing up the game i love this pack but he should had made kerbal space program friendly. just saying

but i want to keep the stock parts

Nova\'s pack is made to replace stock parts. Keeping them would only make things silly.

I know-in order to do that you need to change the \'name\' parameters and folder names of the parts that would overwrite existing parts (e.g. liquidengine1), so that you can put them into your parts folder without overwriting the stock parts.

Nova\'s pack is made to replace stock parts. Keeping them would only make things silly.

He might just want to use things like the fairings or lander legs, and not be bothered by the balance changes.
yep

If it\'s just a few parts that you want, I suggest that you open up the zip file and copy (drag and drop) ONLY those parts into your Parts folder.

That\'s how I got my first set of lander legs.

He might just want to use things like the fairings or lander legs, and not be bothered by the balance changes.

But, but, YOU\'RE NOT SUPPOSED TO DO THAT.

Right. This will make Sordid happy:

Scheduled:

Mk3 pod remodel

Mk4 pod remodel (slight)

0.75m Vostok pod (separate release, if you suggest it be named Kostok I\'ll kill you)

if you suggest it be named Kostok I\'ll kill you)

So.. tempting. Any pics on it yet? Pics help with name.
Ball Bearing Pod.
Name it 'The Egg'

So.. tempting. Any pics on it yet? Pics help with name.

Through the shoutbox, I have decided I will call it Volk (latin-ized russian for Wolf)

Through the shoutbox, I have decided I will call it Volk (latin-ized russian for Wolf)

Good name. Better than The Egg.
Not shown is the vanilla RCS tank and thruster that would be attached.

That\'s a nice ????!

Now add a ????.
I would much rather have a ??????? ?????.

I would much rather have a ??????? ?????.

Sounds more like a launching vehicle to me =P

Sounds more like a launching vehicle to me =P

They are.
That new pod looks very spiffy, albeit a bit high on the polycount...

That new pod looks very spiffy, albeit a bit high on the polycount...

Doesn\'t look that bad, but then again running KSP is like throwing cotton at my CPU.

But this is a gaming rig, so yeah.
You\'ll be amazed what KSP seems to handle as to Poly counts with no worries. As lone as it\'s not stupid large or unnecessary.

You\'ll be amazed what KSP seems to handle as to Poly counts with no worries. As lone as it\'s not stupid large or unnecessary.

This guy is right, if its too large, Unity doesn\'t like to load it. I have run tests with huge spheres will bunches of polys. But of course Nova will optimize it as much as he can.

Keep making parts Nova!
Well, the thing about the sphere is, as long as it\'s a low poly sphere, it will probably top out a few more polys than the default command pod. As it has less 'detail' added, but more smoothness...

I would much rather have a ??????? ?????.

Sure. Let\'s name it something that you can\'t type on an English only keyboard. > Also, no need to be a dick about the name I offered. I was only kidding.
